/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with tall trees, their leaves a vibrant green, providing a natural canopy over the road. On the right side of the street, there's a building with a distinctive curved roof, adding a touch of architectural interest to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The colors in the image are rich and vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
